newsitem.title: INDIA: At least 21 dead in India marriage party accident.
newsitem.headline: At least 21 dead in India marriage party accident.

text.p: At least 21 people in a marriage party were killed on Sunday when the vehicle they were travelling in collided with a truck in central India, United News of India (UNI) said.

The news agency said 11 people were seriously injured in the accident, which took place near Kota town, some 430 km (270 miles) south of the capital New Delhi in Rajasthan state. The dead included 13 women and eight children, UNI said.
The vehicle was carrying more than 35 people when it rammed into the truck, which was carrying stone slabs and tiles, the news agency said.
Six women and five children were taken to hospital after the accident, which occurred at about 9:15 a.m. (0345 GMT).
